casebody.data:
In the MATTER OF the Expungement of the Arrest/Charge Records of T.B. In the Matter of the Expungement of the Arrest/Charge Records of J.N.-T. In the Matter of the Expungement of the Arrest/Charge Records of R.C. M-323 September Term 2017
079813 Supreme Court of New Jersey. November 30, 2017

ORDER

It is ORDERED that the motion of R.C., for a stay is granted, in part, and the stay is limited to the portion of the judgment of the Superior Court, Appellate Division, that vacated R.C.'s order of expungement.
